image_metadata.caption: The Hopf fibration shows how the three-sphere can be built by a collection of circles arranged like points on a two-sphere. This is a frame from {{% resource_link "4c06c7b6-3c49-4ca6-bd36-925f74adf5fa" "an animation" %}} of fibers in the Hopf fibration over various points on the two-sphere. (Image and animation courtesy of {{% resource_link "082b8c66-476f-4cb3-8ef1-b818579b2554" "Niles Johnson" %}}.
image_metadata.image-alt: A collection of colorful circles arranged in such a way as they result in a three-sphere.
